query: Sea Otter Europe Gravel gravel race Girona

videos.title: Trek UCI Gravel World Series Sea Otter Europe-Girona -Highlights-
videos.description:
El mejor gravel del mundo aterrizó en Girona el 21 de septiembre de 2024. Una carrera brutal con un recorrido de ensueño, en el inmejorable marco de la Sea Otter Europe. 

Más de 740 participantes tomaron la salida bajo unas nubes que amenazaban con la lluvia. A pesar de que cayeron algunas gotas, la tormenta esperó a que los primeros corredores cruzaran la meta. Grandes nombres del deporte como Miguel Indurain, Alejandro Valverde, Alison Jackson o Samuel Sánchez acudieron a la cita. Una caída en los entrenamientos privó al Campeón del Mundo Matej Mohoric de poder tomar parte en la competición. 

Matevž Goveckar y Tiffany Cromwell fueron los grandes ganadores de la jornada. 

La carrera sirvió para que Girona se consolidara un poco más como capital del ciclismo y del gravel.

---------------------------

The best gravel in the world landed in Girona on 21 September 2024. A brutal race with a dream course, in the unbeatable setting of the Sea Otter Europe. 

More than 740 participants took the start under clouds that threatened rain. Although a few drops fell, the storm waited for the first riders to cross the finish line. Big names in sport such as Miguel Indurain, Alejandro Valverde, Alison Jackson and Samuel Sánchez attended the event. A fall in training deprived World Champion Matej Mohoric of being able to take part in the competition. 

Matevž Goveckar and Tiffany Cromwell were the big winners of the day. 

The race served to consolidate Girona's position as a cycling and gravel capital.

videos.title: Sea Otter Girona - UCI Gravel World Series // Full Race POV Onboard
videos.description:
107.2km/66.5mi Gravel Race
UCI Gravel World Series - World Championship Qualifier
Girona, Spain

My Patreon: http://patreon.com/justinmcquerry/    
Race Info: https://gironagravelworldseries.com/en/home/

Bike - Ibis Hakka: http://ibiscycles.com/bikes/hakka-mx
Tools & Tubeless Plugs - Prestacycle: https://prestacycle.com
Frame Bags - MoosePacks: http://moosepacks.com/
Ti Bolts and Axles: http://metireggioemilia.it/
Wheels - BERD: http://berdspokes.com/
Tires - Maxxis: https://www.maxxis.com/us/tires/bicycle/
Glasses - Julbo Eyewear: https://julbo.us
Bibs - Assos: https://www.assos.com/us/

videos.title: SEA OTTER 2025 GIRONA GRAVEL RACE UCI
videos.description:
2h30 of the 2025 SEA OTTER EUROPE 226ers UCI Gravel in Girona

Vamos a la muerte ! 

A very difficult track with big rocks and very steeps climbs and downhills !

2h pretty good and after… nothing 😅

206th/800 scratch and 20th/71 in my age group (35/39)

See u in 2026 🥰

videos.description:
UCI Gravel World Séries, Sea Otter Europe (Girona), 105Km, 1900m d+
